text: nivu atyuttama samudayadavaru. Nim'mannu sampurna manava samajakkagi niyojisalagide. Nivu (janarige) satkaryagalannu adesisuvavaru hagu (avarannu) ketta krtyagalinda tadeyuvavaru mattu allahanalli visvasa ullavaru. Granthadavaru (satya dharmavannu) nambiddare, adu avara palige uttamavagiruttittu. Avarallu kelavu visvasigaliddare â€“ adare avaralli heccinavaru avidheyaru
